thread.title: Reports: Tom Cruise didn't attend daughter Isabella's wedding but Nicole Kidman did
thread.title_full: Reports: Tom Cruise didn't attend daughter Isabella's wedding but Nicole Kidman did | syracuse.com

author: Geoff Herbert | gherbert@syracuse.com
title: Reports: Tom Cruise didn't attend daughter Isabella's wedding but Nicole Kidman did
text:
Syracuse native Tom Cruise 's oldest child is now married, but word is the "Mission: Impossible" star didn't attend the wedding.
Isabella Jane Cruise, the actor's adopted daughter from his previous marriage to Nicole Kidman, reportedly tied the knot in a secret ceremony in London on Sept. 18. Photos published by Women's Day magazine show the 22-year-old "Bella" in a thigh-length lace white wedding dress, smiling with her bridesmaids after saying "I do" to British IT consultant Max Parker, also 22.
Perez Hilton reports Tom Cruise and Bella's adopted brother Connor, a DJ, were not at the ceremony, allegedly to keep the wedding private, but mom Nicole Kidman was in attendance. According to the Daily Mail , the Australian actress is currently in London, starring in the West End play "Photograph 51."
Bella, a Scientologist like her dad, recently graduated from cosmetology school at Vidal Sassoon Academy. Four of her classmates were bridesmaids, according to Hilton, who says she has already changed her last name to Parker.
Cruise and Kidman adopted Bella and Connor in 1992 and 1995, respectively. The couple, who co-starred in "Days of Thunder" and "Eyes Wide Shut," split in 2001. Cruise has a birth daughter, 9-year-old Suri with ex-wife Katie Holmes, and Kidman has two biological children with husband Keith Urban.
Cruise most recently appeared in " Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation " and his upcoming films include "Top Gun 2," "Mission: Impossible 6," "Jack Reacher 2" and " Mena ." Kidman's upcoming movies include "Genius," "Secret in Their Eyes" and "How to Talk to Girls at Parties."
